page.description: The {RTF} command places an RTF text box on the Xdialog.

argument.name: %Directives%
argument.description: Character. Refer to Xdialog Language Directives and Operators.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. An integer value for the maximum number of characters to display on one line. The actual number displayed may be less because of word wrap.

argument.name: Columns
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. Default = 1. An integer value for the number of rows to display.

argument.name: Label
argument.description: Character. The label of the RTF control.

page.example: dim r as P dim a as C r = rtf.create(" ") r.insert("Initial text to appear in RTF field. Right click and select Properties or display RTF Editor to change font attributes.", 1) a = r.rtf_text ui_dlg_box("Xdialog Sample", <<%dlg% {rtf=a}<15,2Display Editor>; %dlg%) r.rtf_text = a a5_rtf_editor2(r)
